title: Prime Factors of Number
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of prime factorization and how it can be implemented in JavaScript using the trial division algorithm. We will learn how to find the prime factors of a given number and build a function that can handle this task. This lab will provide hands-on experience and a deeper understanding of the algorithm and its implementation.

meta.title: Mastering Prime Factorization with JavaScript
meta.description: Dive into the world of prime factorization and learn how to implement the trial division algorithm in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, number theory, prime factorization, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, javascript lab, trial division algorithm, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Commands History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 数字的质因数
i18n.description: 在这个实验中，我们将探讨质因数分解的概念，以及如何使用试除法在JavaScript中实现它。我们将学习如何找到给定数字的质因数，并构建一个能够处理此任务的函数。这个实验将提供实践经验，并加深对该算法及其实现的理解。

meta.title: 用JavaScript掌握质因数分解
meta.description: 深入探索质因数分解的世界，学习如何在JavaScript中实现试除法算法。
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript实践, 数论, 质因数分解, 在线javascript实践, 编程教程, javascript实验, 试除法算法, javascript教程
